text: Google is notorious for giving damn all technical detail when publishing CVEs but they put it at a 10 out of 10 on the severity scale which is relatively rare. I guess this could become a bit like Log4Shell since it is a library used in other applications too. Hopefully, ISVs are doing due diligence and ensuring if their products use it, they are scheduling their own patches.
